definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze

sentences.english: Is not the colored glaze semi-annular jade pendant?
sentences.chinese: 不色的釉是否是半環型玉下垂？

sentences.english: The preparation technique and application of noctilucent powder and noctilucent glaze were introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了夜光粉和夜光釉的製作方法及其應用。

sentences.english: This paper introduces research process of sacrificial red on famous traditional high-temperature coloured glazes ;
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了對傳統名貴高溫顏色釉祭紅的研製過程。

sentences.english: In addition, the glaze belongs to calcium glaze in which plant ash was added.
sentences.chinese: 另外，白瓷釉可能是加有草木灰的鈣釉。

sentences.english: The ideal opacity glaze was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 並獲得了效果理想的複合乳濁釉。

sentences.english: A white spot appears on the enamel where the tooth has started to weaken inside.
sentences.chinese: 牙釉上有個白色斑點，對牙齒內部的保護就減弱。

sentences.english: We also engage in producing " Baoshi " glaze and adobe pigments.
Hollow-out censer in pea green to bake with glaze and become, a sphere tank shape, .
sentences.chinese: 鏤空香爐以豆綠釉燒製而成，呈圓體罐狀，。

sentences.english: An experimental study of glaze-fit of some commercial fine earthenwares is described.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗對幾種精陶器的坯釉結合性能作了研究。

sentences.english: The condition of willemite formation in the glaze melt and the range of glaze composition are determined.
sentences.chinese: 確定了釉中硅鋅礦的形成條件和釉料組成範圍。

sentences.english: A female ferret will die if it goes into heat and cannot find a mate.
sentences.chinese: 雌白釉在酷熱的環境下如果找不到配偶就會死亡。

sentences.english: Most of the body is thickly glazed , but thinly- glazed areas appear almost white.
sentences.chinese: 大多數器物釉體厚重，然而大部分白色釉卻比較薄。

sentences.english: Low-zirconium rhyolite has been successfully used as emulsifier in manufacturing emulsified glaze.
sentences.chinese: 用低鋯流紋岩作爲乳濁釉中的乳濁劑，獲得了成功。

sentences.english: The factors which affect the firing temperature of the glaze were discussed, and the opacifying mechanism of glaze was also approached.
sentences.chinese: 探討了影響釉燒成溫度的諸因素及釉的乳濁機理。

sentences.english: The factors which affect the firing temperature of the glaze were discussed, and the opacifying mechanism of glaze was also approached.
sentences.chinese: 探討了影響釉燒成溫度的諸因素及釉的乳濁機理。

sentences.english: Red and yellow glaze, natural glaze line, like the Han Xue.
sentences.chinese: 通體施黃紅釉，釉線自然，恰似汗血。

definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
(in ceramics, lacquerware etc) the base (made of clay, metal, bamboo etc) onto which a glaze, lacquer or other decorative elements are applied
